summary:
Dragons? They are not dragons, they are just lizards with wings.
That was the impression I had of dragons in the game.
Now the Dragons are fearsome creatures that destroy and kill everything in their way.
You have to hide of his breath, and see how a Dovah can be deadly.
descriptionHtml:
Latest Version 1.2, see the change log session :-).

If you like this mod, please endorse it. 
This motivates us to continue the work :-)

====================
 Description
====================
 
Dragons? They are not dragons, they are just lizards with wings.
 
That was the impression I had of dragons in the game.
 
I came to this conclusion when I saw a small group of soldiers easy killing Mirmulnir in Western Watchtower without any difficulty (and basically no losses).
 
I saw a Frost Troll killing a Frost Dragon in Eldersblood Peak (simply because the Frost Troll is immune to the breath of the Frost Dragon and dragon bite did not cause enough damage due to Troll regeneration)
 and a farmer fighting a dragon with only their fists (and surviving two puffs of fire of the dragon).
 
I thought, are just lizards with wings.
 
I was not afraid to see a dragon ... Instead, I thought, another flying lizard.
 
Actually, I thought the dragon priests were a much bigger challenge than a dragon rs.
 
I decided to change that.
 
Now the Dragons are fearsome creatures that destroy and kill everything in their way.
 
You have to hide of his breath, and see how a Dovah can be deadly.
 
====================
Change log
====================

VERSION 1.2
- Added Balanced Version

VERSION 1.1
- Increases resistance to magic and damage (50% of resistance)
- Unleveled the leveled list(Optional). So, sometimes, due to their level, you need to flee instead of fight (Sometimes we are simply not prepared to kill certain dragon).
- Increased the area of the fireball, frostball and icestorm to dragons. (Not the magic of the player)
- Fixed problem where some dragons were not changed by the mod. Now, all dragons are more powerful.

VERSION 1.0
  Old Version
-Damage from melee attacks, such as biting among others, have been increased.
-Damage to the breath of dragons have been increased.
-Added more resistant to damage and magic to the dragons (25% of Resistence).
-Increasing Difficulty of dragons


====================
 Technical Data
====================
 
Damage from melee attacks, such as biting among others, have been increased.
 
Damage to the breath of dragons have been increased.
 
Added more resistant to damage and magic to the dragons (50% of Resistence).
 
Increasing life of dragons

Increasing Difficulty of dragons
 
====================
 compatibility
====================
 
This mod is not compatible with mods That alter Dragons.
 
====================
 bugs
====================
 
None that I know of.

If you find any bugs, please let me know ;-).
 
====================
 Installation
====================
 
Extract the contents of .zip file in Skyrim/Data and check the plugin in game launcher.
 
====================
 uninstall
====================
 
Simply uncheck the plugin in the game launcher. 

====================
My Other Mods
====================

Better Werewolf by RPM
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4102
author: RPM
